hero.subtitle: In danger of
hero.title: Earthquake? Know Your Family is Safe
hero.text:
Get alerted when an earthquake hits your home.

 Immediately look for any damages with real times images from your home.

items.title: Get peace of mind despite earthquake.
items.text: We identify earth quake and send you notifications by text or email.

items.title: Quickly evaluate damages.
items.text: With 1 minutes of an earthquake happening you get a short video of your home.

items.title: Make your house safer.
items.text: When there is no earthquake our camera is still available. Use it to improve home safety.

items.title: A security camera triggered by earth vibrations.
items.text: Our app converts your phone to a seismograph and alerts you when needed.
Earthquake are getting more frequent and I'm worried about my familly. SensorFocus gives me peace of mind.
items.name: Nellie Graham

items.text: Earthquake are getting more frequent and I'm worried about my familly.
items.name: Jack Scott

items.text: Earthquake are getting more frequent and I'm worried about my familly. SensorFocus gives me peace of mind. SensorFocus gives me peace of mind.
items.name: Sherri Meyer

subhero.subtitle: Allows you to
subhero.title:
Get Peace of Mind,
and Much More...
subhero.text:
Real time text alert when a earthquake hits your home.

More security and fun the rest of the time.

app.title: Your News Feed
app.text: Simple and intuitive “Facebook” like news feed. You get a news feed that is tailored to your solution and personalized to your needs.

items.cta: TV real time status so you know they agree to your house rules.
How many hours was watched today, this week, this month.
Hourly summary of the last 7 days and last month.
Daily pattern of TV consumption so you can change the routin.

notifications.subtitle: Lets you
notifications.title:
Stay Informed,
Stay in Control
notifications.text:
You can’t always be watching your news feed.

So SensorFocus App looks for activity and sends an alert to your phone if it sees something.

items.title: Get Notified Quickly
items.text: Set limits with your kids. Help them monitor their behaviour without being intrusive.

items.title: Get a Clear View of Damages
items.text: SMS Text or email alerts delivered to your phone when TV or video game usage goes above custom limits.

items.title: No Earthquake: Just Get a Great Security Camera
items.text: SensorFocus is a great security camera. You will see a ton a benefits even if there is no earthquake.

items.caption: Just Mobile AluPocket. Digital image. Web. 1 Sep 2016. just-mobile.eu
items.title: Sensor Device
items.text: Make your phone aware of its environment and control all its cameras and sensors remotely.

items.title: Client Device
items.text: Application always looks for activity and sends an alert to your phone if it sees something.

items.title: Create Your Account
items.text: Create your account on the SensorFocus platform. It’s free and secure.

items.title: Install the App
items.text: Download and install the SensorFocus app on your retired smart phone.

items.title: Pick Your Solution
items.text: Your first steps into the digital enterprise. Develop reliable and low cost solutions tailored to your needs.

install.title: Easy to Install
install.text: Devices are easy to install and they look great in your home or business. Connects to your home WiFi, no SIM card required.

items.caption: Joby GripTight Gorillapod Pro. Digital image. Web. 1 Aug 2016. joby.com
items.cta: Use a car holder, tripod, selfie stick that you already own. Learn more.

items.caption: Dockem Koala Wall Mount. Digital image. Web. 1 Aug 2016. dockem.com
items.cta: Purchase a wall mount from Amazon or Ebay. There are dozen available at low cost.
Do your own solutions with hundreds of ideas available. Learn more.

items.title: Secured solution
items.text: We work with Amazon Servers, most trusted secure solution.

items.title: Social
items.text: Easy to share content in social networks.

items.title: Easy to use
items.text: Our solution is designed to be used by everyone, not only experts.

items.title: Easy to install
items.text: The complete solution can be installed in a matter of minutes.

items.title: Green
items.text: Bring your old phones back to life!

items.title: Fun
items.text: Get notifications and pictures of the most important events.
